FuncDef:
The sr-te-policy seamless-bfd enable command enables seamless bidirectional forwarding detection (SBFD) for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
The undo sr-te-policy seamless-bfd enable command disables SBFD for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
By default, SBFD is disabled for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
SR-MPLS TE Policies are used to direct traffic to traverse an SR-MPLS TE network. To improve SR-MPLS TE Policy reliability, you can run the sr-te-policy seamless-bfd enable command to enable SBFD for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
